title: Ice Trended Caramel Macchiato 6/3: Texas, NBA, Dr. Fauci, Grimes
itunes:title: Ice Trended Caramel Macchiato 6/3: Texas, NBA, Dr. Fauci, Grimes
description:
On this edition of Ice Trended Caramel Macchiato Jack and Miles discuss the Texas valedictorian who went off script, NBA news, how "Fauci lied; people died", and Grime's techno-communist TikTok video.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
